Introduction.Title: Introduction to Python in Tamil
Content: Python oru high-level, interpreted, general-purpose programming language. Idhu simplicity matrum readability nala romba popular.
Idhai Guido van Rossum 1991 la release panna. Python procedural, object-oriented matrum functional programming support pannum.
Python web development, data science, artificial intelligence, automation, scientific computing ellathukum use aagum.
Idhoda dynamic typing matrum automatic memory management nala code eludhuradhu easy. Windows, macOS, Linux ellathulayum smooth-a run aagum.
Python interactive shell REPL (Read-Eval-Print Loop) kudukkum, idhu quick code testing matrum debugging ku use aagum.

Popular.Title: Why Python is Popular?
Content: Popular frameworks Django matrum Flask web development ku best, TensorFlow matrum PyTorch AI & Machine Learning field la powerful.
Python automation ku romba useful. Web scraping, testing, scripting ellam easy aagum.
Top companies Google, Facebook, Netflix, NASA Python use pannura, idhu reliable matrum efficient nu prove aagum.
Python easily C, C++, Java oda integrate panna mudiyum, idhu multi-language projects ku helpful.
Python small scripts lendhu large-scale applications varaikum ella project types kum suitable.

Installation.Title: Installation of Python
Content: Python Windows, macOS matrum Linux la install panna simple steps:
Windows:
1. Python official website lendhu download pannu: https://www.python.org/downloads/
2. Installer run panna 'Add Python to PATH' tick panna marakama.
3. Command Prompt open panni `python --version` type panni check pannu.
macOS:
1. macOS la Python pre-installed irukkum, but latest version website lendhu download panna mudiyum.
2. Installer run panni step-by-step instructions follow pannu.
3. Terminal open panni `python3 --version` command type panni check pannu.
Linux:
1. Linux distributions la Python pre-installed irukkum.
2. Ubuntu users ku `sudo apt update` matrum `sudo apt install python3` command run pannanum.
3. `python3 --version` command use panni installation verify pannu.
